title: Client
description: A Client as perceived by the signaling server or another client in the signaling session

id.description: The unique identifier of the client generated by the signaling server when entering the signaling session

address.description: The address of the client as perceived by the signaling server in the IP:port format

properties.description: An arbitrary dictionary that can be used to carry custom properties across the signaling protocol. A 'domain' property should be available in the object.
